allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update backend with Cloudinary integration for document management

This commit adds Cloudinary cloud storage integration to replace local file uploads:
- Add Cloudinary configuration and setup documentation
- Update server.js with Cloudinary upload/download endpoints
- Add migration script for existing local files to Cloudinary
- Include .env.example with required Cloudinary environment variables
- Update package.json with cloudinary dependency

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Backend for Viron Bookkeeping Services

This commit includes the complete backend application with:
- Express server with API endpoints for clients, documents, and dependents
- MySQL database configuration and connection handling
- Cloudinary integration for document storage
- Migration scripts for database setup and data migration
- Authentication and CORS configuration
- File upload/download functionality

)")
